00049 int main(int ac, char **av)

00051     char *args[11], *host, *tmp;

00056     if( ! args[2] ) {
00057             cout<<"environment variable USER is not set"<<endl;
00058             return 111;
00059     }
00060     args[6] = getenv("EXT");
00061     if( ! args[6] ) {
00062             cout<<"environment variable EXT is not set"<<endl;
00063             return 111;
00064     }
00065     string ext(args[6]);
00066     ext = ext.substr(0,ext.find('-'));
00067     
00068     if( (tmp = getenv("HOME")) == NULL ) {
00069             cout<<"environment variable HOME is not set"<<endl;
00070             return 111;
00071     }
00072     string home(tmp);
00073     if( chdir(home.c_str()) ) {
00074             cout<<"chdir: " << home << ": " << strerror(errno) << endl;
00075             return 111;
00076     }
00077     if( chdir(split_user(ext).c_str()) ) {
00078             cout<<"deliver: Sorry, no mailbox here by that name. (#5.1.1)"<<endl;
00079             return 100;
00080     }
00081     home+='/';
00082     home+=split_user(ext);
00083     home+='/';
00084     args[3] = (char*) home.c_str();
00085 
00086     args[4] = getenv("LOCAL");

00088             cout<<"environment variable LOCAL is not set"<<endl;
00089             return 111;
00090     }
00091     args[5] = "-";
00092     args[7] = host = getenv("HOST");

00094             cout<<"environment variable HOST is not set"<<endl;
00095             return 111;
00096     }
00097     args[8] = getenv("SENDER");

00100             return 111;
00101     }
00102     args[9] = "./Maildir/";
